description.en: LTO Network is a blockchain platform for creating decentralized workflow applications, while maintaining data privacy and GDPR compliance. Developers and enterprises can use the LTO toolkit to either create new, or integrate existing solutions — and run them in a transparent, secure and decentralized way.

status_updates.description:
KuCoin Blockchain Day 🍻🍕🍷 V-ID, Dusk Network, KuCoin, Fantom, Maxonrow, CFN, Blockdata, & others.

We are excited for the community reunion this Thursday! Drinks, pizza, and an insightful panel discussion on the adoption of blockchain & digital assets, with cool prizes by the KuCoin team. 

https://www.eventbrite.co.uk/e/kucoin-blockchain-day-1114-tickets-79195244107

Summer Summary 🌞 LTO Network

Autumn is the best time for adoption. Everyone is ready to do business again. So we have been working non-stop during summer to prepare everything we need to stand out from the pack.

Technical upgrades on Layer 1 and Layer 2, documentation, community AMAs, new website, business materials, extended team lockups... Let’s dive into what we have been working on!

What's coming next? 👉 https://blog.lto.network/summer-summary-lto-network/

🤖 March Weekly Update #2 🤖
https://twitter.com/LTOnetwork/status/1109071748388061184

- Live Contracts preview
- CertiK partnership
- Capptions integration
- Interview with Crypto Zombie 
- AMA with DBCrypto
- Network Report: over 9,000 daily txs
- 5 big business events
- New Brigde Troll design

❗️ Important community announcement ❗️ 
-> http://t.me/ltoinfo/219 

Community engagement: we are raising the bar even higher! Don't ask "moon lambo exchange" - let's get there together 🤗

🤖 A must-read about our plans for this year 🤖 
https://medium.com/ltonetwork/strategic-business-plan-for-2019-58473fa26948

Part 1: Conceptual summary of LTO Network 
- How LTO Network creates value (technology) 
- What value we create (product and clients) 
- How we capture and maintain this value (token economy)

Part 2: Strategic Business Plan 2019 
- Why other projects die , and how we fix that 
- Product focus for 2019 on anchoring 
- SWOT analysis and marketing approach
Full transparency report with all token holders and the bridge dynamics -> http://bit.ly/2RdOlMw
